name: NewPermit
xslt:
<xsl:stylesheet version="2.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform">            
    <xsl:template match="/">
        <NewPermit p1:applicationType="Accompany" p1:channel="channel1" p1:correlationId="correlationId1" xmlns:p1="http://vision.emaratech.ae/" xmlns="http://vision.emaratech.ae/">
            <applicationInfo xmlns="">
                <appNo>
                    <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicationDetails/ApplicationId"/>
                </appNo>
                <appId>-1</appId>
                <appDate>
                    <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicationDetails/Paymentdate"/>
                </appDate>
                <applicationType>
                    <id>
                        <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicationDetails/ApplicationType"/>
                    </id>
                </applicationType>
                <visaType>
                    <id>
                        <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicationDetails/VisaTypeId"/>
                    </id>
                </visaType>
                <applicationSubType>
                    <id>
                        <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicationDetails/ApplicationSubType"/>
                    </id>
                </applicationSubType>
                <ednrdAppSourceId>
                    <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicationDetails/ChannelId"/>
                </ednrdAppSourceId>
                <submitter>
                    <id>1</id>
                </submitter>
                <channel>
                    <id>2</id>
                </channel>
                <channelModuleId xmlns="">
                    <xsl:choose>
                        <xsl:when test="UnifiedApplication/ApplicationDetails/FileTypeId[.=1]">
                            <xsl:text>4</xsl:text>
                        </xsl:when>
                        <xsl:otherwise>
                            <xsl:text>2</xsl:text>
                        </xsl:otherwise>
                    </xsl:choose>
                </channelModuleId>
                <module xmlns="">
                    <id>
                        <xsl:choose>
                            <xsl:when test="UnifiedApplication/ApplicationDetails/ApplicationType[.=1]">
                                <xsl:text>1</xsl:text>
                            </xsl:when>
                            <xsl:when test="UnifiedApplication/ApplicationDetails/ApplicationType[.=9]">
                                <xsl:text>1</xsl:text>
                            </xsl:when>
                            <xsl:when test="UnifiedApplication/ApplicationDetails/ApplicationType[.=10]">
                                <xsl:text>1</xsl:text>
                            </xsl:when>
                            <xsl:when test="UnifiedApplication/ApplicationDetails/ApplicationType[.=22]">
                                <xsl:text>2</xsl:text>
                            </xsl:when>
                            <xsl:when test="UnifiedApplication/ApplicationDetails/ApplicationType[.=23]">
                                <xsl:text>2</xsl:text>
                            </xsl:when>
                            <xsl:when test="UnifiedApplication/ApplicationDetails/ApplicationType[.=30]">
                                <xsl:text>2</xsl:text>
                            </xsl:when>
                        </xsl:choose>
                    </id>
                </module>
                <emirate>
                    <id>2</id>
                </emirate>
                <healthInsured>false</healthInsured>
                <isMobVisa>false</isMobVisa>
                <isPassportUpdated>false</isPassportUpdated>
                <isUrgent>
                    <xsl:choose>
                        <xsl:when test="UnifiedApplication/ApplicationDetails/IsUrgent[.=0]">
                            <xsl:text>false</xsl:text>
                        </xsl:when>
                        <xsl:otherwise>
                            <xsl:text>true</xsl:text>
                        </xsl:otherwise>
                    </xsl:choose>
                </isUrgent>
                <isInsideUae>
                    <xsl:choose>         
                        <xsl:when test="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/IsInsideUAE[.=1]">
                            <xsl:text>1</xsl:text>
                        </xsl:when>
                        <xsl:otherwise>
                            <xsl:text>2</xsl:text>
                        </xsl:otherwise>
                    </xsl:choose>
                </isInsideUae>
            </applicationInfo>
            <sponsorInfo xmlns="">
                <sponsorFileNo>
                    <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/SponsorDetails/SponsorNo"/>
                </sponsorFileNo>
                <sponsorType> 
                    <id>
                        <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/SponsorDetails/SponsorTypeId"/>
                    </id>
                </sponsorType> 
                <salary>
                    <xsl:choose>
                        <xsl:when test="UnifiedApplication/SponsorDetails/Salary[.='']">
                            <xsl:text>0</xsl:text>
                        </xsl:when>
                        <xsl:otherwise>
                            <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/SponsorDetails/Salary"/>
                        </xsl:otherwise>
                    </xsl:choose>
                </salary>
            </sponsorInfo>
            <applicantInfo xmlns="">
                <abroadAddress1>
                    <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/AddressOutside1"/>
                </abroadAddress1>
                <abroadAddress2>
                    <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/AddressOutside2"/>
                </abroadAddress2>
                <abroadAddressCountry>
                    <id>
                        <xsl:choose>
                            <xsl:when test="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/AddressOutsideCountryId[.='']">
                                <xsl:text>null</xsl:text>
                            </xsl:when>
                            <xsl:otherwise>
                                <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/AddressOutsideCountryId"/>
                            </xsl:otherwise>
                        </xsl:choose>
                    </id>
                </abroadAddressCountry>
                <abroadCity>
                    <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/ADDRESS_OUTSIDE_CITY"/>
                </abroadCity>
                <abroadTelNo>
                    <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/ADDRESS_OUTSIDE_TEL_NO"/>
                </abroadTelNo>
                <applicantId xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:nil="true"/>
                <area>
                    <id>
                        <xsl:choose>
                            <xsl:when test="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/AreaId!=''">
                                <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/AreaId"/>
                            </xsl:when>
                            <xsl:otherwise>
                                <xsl:text>219</xsl:text>
                            </xsl:otherwise>
                        </xsl:choose>
                    </id>
                </area>
                <birthCountry>
                    <id>
                        <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/BirthCountryId"/>
                    </id>
                </birthCountry>
                <birthDate>
                    <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/BirthDate"/>
                </birthDate>
                <birthPlaceEn>
                    <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/BirthPlaceE"/>
                </birthPlaceEn>
                <birthPlaceAr>
                    <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/BirthPlaceA"/>
                </birthPlaceAr>
                <buildingName>
                    <xsl:choose>
                        <xsl:when test="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/Building!=''">
                            <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/Building"/>
                        </xsl:when>
                        <xsl:otherwise>
                            <xsl:text>null</xsl:text>
                        </xsl:otherwise>
                    </xsl:choose>
                </buildingName>
                <city>
                    <id>
                        <xsl:choose>
                            <xsl:when test="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/CityId!=''">
                                <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/CityId"/>
                            </xsl:when>
                            <xsl:otherwise>
                                <xsl:text>202</xsl:text>
                            </xsl:otherwise>
                        </xsl:choose>
                    </id>
                </city>
                <education>
                    <id>
                        <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/EducationId"/>
                    </id>
                </education>
                <email>
                    <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/Email"/>
                </email>
                <emirate>
                    <id>
                        <xsl:choose>
                            <xsl:when test="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/EmirateId!=''">
                                <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/EmirateId"/>
                            </xsl:when>
                            <xsl:otherwise>
                                <xsl:text>2</xsl:text>
                            </xsl:otherwise>
                        </xsl:choose>
                    </id>
                </emirate>
                <faith>
                    <id>
                        <xsl:choose>
                            <xsl:when test="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/ReligionId[.='0']">
                                <xsl:text>10</xsl:text>
                            </xsl:when>
                            <xsl:when test="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/ReligionId[.='1']">
                                <xsl:text>11</xsl:text>
                            </xsl:when>
                            <xsl:when test="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/ReligionId[.='2']">
                                <xsl:text>12</xsl:text>
                            </xsl:when>
                            <xsl:when test="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/ReligionId[.='3']">
                                <xsl:text>13</xsl:text>
                            </xsl:when>
                            <xsl:when test="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/ReligionId[.='4']">
                                <xsl:text>14</xsl:text>
                            </xsl:when>
                            <xsl:when test="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/ReligionId[.='5']">
                                <xsl:text>15</xsl:text>
                            </xsl:when>
                            <xsl:when test="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/ReligionId[.='6']">
                                <xsl:text>16</xsl:text>
                            </xsl:when>
                            <xsl:when test="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/ReligionId[.='7']">
                                <xsl:text>17</xsl:text>
                            </xsl:when>
                            <xsl:when test="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/ReligionId[.='8']">
                                <xsl:text>20</xsl:text>
                            </xsl:when>
                            <xsl:when test="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/ReligionId[.='9']">
                                <xsl:text>19</xsl:text>
                            </xsl:when>
                            <xsl:when test="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/ReligionId[.='11']">
                                <xsl:text>21</xsl:text>
                            </xsl:when>
                            <xsl:otherwise>
                                <xsl:text>-1</xsl:text>
                            </xsl:otherwise>
                        </xsl:choose>
                    </id>
                </faith>
                <familyNameAr>
                    <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/LastNameA"/>
                </familyNameAr>
                <familyNameEn>
                    <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/LastNameE"/>
                </familyNameEn>
                <fatherNameAr>
                    <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/FatherNameA"/>
                </fatherNameAr>
                <fatherNameEn>
                    <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/FatherNameE"/>
                </fatherNameEn>
                <firstNameAr>
                    <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/FirstNameA"/>
                </firstNameAr>
                <firstNameEn>
                    <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/FirstNameE"/>
                </firstNameEn>
                <flatNo>
                    <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/flat"/>
                </flatNo>
                <fromAccreditedUniversity>false</fromAccreditedUniversity>
                <gender>
                    <id>
                        <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/SexId"/>
                    </id>
                </gender>
                <hasPDA>true</hasPDA>
                <language>
                    <id>98</id>
                </language>
                <lastNameAr>
                    <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/LastNameA"/>
                </lastNameAr>
                <lastNameEn>
                    <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/LastNameE"/>
                </lastNameEn>
                <middleNameAr>
                    <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/MiddleNameA"/>
                </middleNameAr>
                <middleNameEn>
                    <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/MiddleNameE"/>
                </middleNameEn>
                <mobileNo>
                    <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/ProMobileNo"/>
                </mobileNo>
                <motherNameAr>
                    <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/MotherNameA"/>
                </motherNameAr>
                <motherNameEn>
                    <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/MotherNameE"/>
                </motherNameEn>
                <nameAr>
                    <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/FullNameA"/>
                </nameAr>
                <nameEn>
                    <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/FullNameE"/>
                </nameEn>
                <nationality>
                    <id>
                        <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/CurrentNationalityId"/>
                    </id>
                </nationality>
                <officeTelNo>
                    <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/ProWorkPhone"/>
                </officeTelNo>
                <passportExpiryDate>
                    <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/PassportExpiryDate"/>
                </passportExpiryDate>
                <passportIssueCountry>
                    <id>
                        <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/PassportIssueCountryId"/>
                    </id>
                </passportIssueCountry>
                <passportIssueDate>
                    <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/PassportIssueDate"/>
                </passportIssueDate>
                <passportIssueGov>
                    <id>
                        <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/PassportIssueCountryId"/>
                    </id>
                </passportIssueGov>
                <passportNo>
                    <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/PassportNo"/>
                </passportNo>
                <passportNoNumeric>1</passportNoNumeric>
                <passportPlaceEn>
                    <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/PassportPlaceE"/>
                </passportPlaceEn>
                <passportPlaceAr>
                    <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/PassportPlaceA"/>
                </passportPlaceAr>
                <passportType>
                    <id>
                        <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/PassportTypeId"/>
                    </id>
                </passportType>
                <poBox>        
                    <xsl:choose>
                        <xsl:when test="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/PoBox!=''">
                            <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/PoBox"/>
                        </xsl:when>
                        <xsl:otherwise>
                            <xsl:text>111111</xsl:text>
                        </xsl:otherwise>
                    </xsl:choose>
                </poBox>
                <poboxEmirateId>
                    <id>
                        <xsl:choose>
                            <xsl:when test="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/EmirateId!=''">
                                <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/EmirateId"/>
                            </xsl:when>
                            <xsl:otherwise>
                                <xsl:text>2</xsl:text>
                            </xsl:otherwise>
                        </xsl:choose>
                    </id>
                </poboxEmirateId>
                <salary>0</salary>
                <previousNationality>
                    <id>
                        <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/PreviousNationalityId"/>
                    </id>
                </previousNationality>
                <profession>
                    <id>
                        <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/ProfessionId"/>
                    </id>
                </profession>
                <relationship>
                    <id>
                        <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/SponsorDetails/SponsorRelationId"/>
                    </id>
                </relationship>
                <religion>
                    <id>
                        <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/ReligionId"/>
                    </id>
                </religion>
                <residenceTelNo>
                    <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/ResidenceTelNo"/>
                </residenceTelNo>
                <secondaryLanguage>
                    <id>98</id>
                </secondaryLanguage>
                <socialStatus>
                    <id>
                        <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/MaritalStatusId"/>
                    </id>
                </socialStatus>
                <streetName>
                    <xsl:choose>
                        <xsl:when test="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/Street!=''">
                            <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/Street"/>
                        </xsl:when>
                        <xsl:otherwise>
                            <xsl:text>null</xsl:text>
                        </xsl:otherwise>
                    </xsl:choose>
                </streetName>
                <teritiaryLanguage>
                    <id>98</id>
                </teritiaryLanguage>
                <vehicleCountry>
                    <id>
                        <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/VehicleCountryId"/>
                    </id>
                </vehicleCountry>
                <vehicleNo>
                    <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicantDetails/VehicleNo"/>
                </vehicleNo>
            </applicantInfo>
            <applicationDocuments xmlns="">
                <xsl:for-each select="UnifiedApplication/DocumentDetails/DocumentDetail">
                    <applicationDocument>
                        <documentType>
                            <id>
                                <xsl:value-of select="DocumentTypeId"/>
                            </id>
                        </documentType>
                        <documentReference>
                            <docRefId>-1</docRefId>
                            <document>
                                <xsl:value-of select="Document"/>
                            </document>
                        </documentReference>
                    </applicationDocument>
                </xsl:for-each>
            </applicationDocuments>
            <applicationPayment xmlns="">
                <totalAmount>1</totalAmount>
                <paymentDate>
                    <xsl:value-of select="UnifiedApplication/ApplicationDetails/Paymentdate"/>
                </paymentDate>
                <xsl:for-each select="UnifiedApplication/FeeDetails/FeeDetail">
                    <details>
                        <feeAmount>
                            <xsl:value-of select="Amount"/>
                        </feeAmount>
                        <feeType>
                            <id>
                                <xsl:value-of select="FeeTypeId"/>
                            </id>
                        </feeType>
                        <feeUnit>
                            <xsl:value-of select="FeeUnit"/>
                        </feeUnit>
                    </details>
                </xsl:for-each>
            </applicationPayment>
            <applicationEidaDetail xmlns=""/>
        </NewPermit>
    </xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>
